title: Purtid Odor Around Valero in Chalmette
description: It's horrible around 630pm Wed 1.21.2015 and getting worse

title: Chemical Smell - Uptown New Orleans
description: Very strong gas like chemical smell near annunciation and Valmont streets on 1/20/15 at 6:47pm.

title: Burning Rubber Smell in Chalmette
description: Hi. This is Code Name Bloopy. I was riding down East St. Bernard Highway and I just passed the Rain CII Petroleum Coke Facility and the whole air smells like burning rubber or burning tires, or something to that effect. 10:39 on the 19th of January, MLK Day, very little wind, very clear skies only a little bit of clouds and it's 10:39. Y'all have a goodnight, bye.

title: Awful Burning Rubber Smell in Chalmette
description: Hi. This is Code Name Bloopy. It's 11:24, Sunday the 18th of February,   think, the day before MLK Day and I'm in Chalmette near the Rain C2 Petroleum Coke facility and there's a heavy smell of a kind of a like a burning rubber type smell. It smells kind of like an electrical fire, something like somebody's burning Styrofoam or something to that effect. It's really awful. The wind is heading out of the Northwest to the Southeast and it's clear night, a cool night and not many clouds. Thank you and have a great night.

description:
This is Liz Gordon. The time now is 4:49 PM, and the date is January the 12th 2015. There's a foul odor coming from ExxonMobil that's in the air that is going from the North. It smells like turpentine, something on that line of smell. Anyways, my name is Liz Gordon. Thank you.

title: Calumet Smoke
description:
Hey everybody. The Calumet plant on my lefthand side, and from Midway to Flora. I mean they really got it smoked up even though it's raining. You can see they got that bad boy turned on all the way up and it's just smoke, smokey everywhere from whatever pipe or whatever they got coming through. It's just smoked up.

title: Natural Gas Leak - Saint Rose
description:
Natural gas leak on fox Lane in Saint Rose, has been going on over a year now, you can see where it is in the winter time, it has the tallest  
greenest grass around it

title: NORCO flare
description: NORCO display Thursday evening

title: Extremely Strong Sulfur Odor - Baton Rouge
description: Extremely strong odor in the air South of LSU campus between Highland Road and Stanford Ave. The odor is nauseating - sulfur compounds.

title: Shell/Motiva Flare Stack
description: I work on the 14th floor of an office building in the CBD in New Orleans. I can see the Shell/Motiva flare stack out of my window. There is currently a HUGE tower of flame shooting out of the stack, with a large cloud of black smoke.

title: NRC Report: Flaring at Motiva/Shell Chemical, Norco
description:
Report Details
NRC Report ID: 1105169
Incident Time: 2015-01-08 13:48
Nearest City: Norco, LA
Location: 15536 RIVER ROAD
Incident Type: FIXED
Material: UNKNOWN ETHYLENE
Medium Affected: AIR
Suspected Responsible Party: MOTIVA/SHELL CHEMICAL

Report Description
CALLER STATED THAT THE PROCESSING UNIT EXPERIENCED AN UPSET DUE TO THE COLD WEATHER CAUSING THE UNIT TO GO TO FLARE CAUSING A RELEASE OF ETHYLENE TO THE ATMOSPHERE.

title: NRC Report: Propylene release at Motiva/Shell Chemical, Norco
description:
Report Details
NRC Report ID: 1105140
Incident Time: 1/8/2015 9:25:38 AM
Nearest City: Norco, LA
Location: 15536 RIVER ROAD
Incident Type: FIXED
Material: UNKNOWN PROPYLENE
Medium Affected: AIR
Suspected Responsible Party: MOTIVA/SHELL CHEMICAL

Report Description
CALLER STATED THAT THEIR  TRACKING UNIT EXPERIENCED AN UPSET CAUSING A RELIEF VALVE TO RELEASE PROPYLENE TO THE ATMOSPHERE.

title: The plant is dispersing fumes again - Chalmette
description:
Hi this is Wendy Bayham. I'm in Chalmette, Louisiana. The plant is dispersing out more of them fumes again. The smell is so strong it burns your eyes and makes your stomach feel nauseous. My phone number is 504-617-5609. Thank you.

title: It smells like it raining fuel in chalmette
description: Heavy downpour around 9:45pm Jan 3rd 2015 with heavy diesel fuel odor infiltrating home

title: Forty foot flame
description: Flaring as seen from the Luling Bridge at 8:10pm on January 3rd. Very bright, looked like a forty foot flame at least!
